pr_title: [CDAP-17246] Fix js error while editing draft or importing pipeline from wrangler

timeline.bodyText: why not use uuid instead of doing random?
timeline.author: elfenheart
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -41,7 +41,8 @@ class HydratorPlusPlusHydratorService {
       let nodeInfo = angular.extend(stage, {
         type: stage.plugin.type,
         label: stage.plugin.label,
-        icon: this.DAGPlusPlusFactory.getIcon(stage.plugin.name)
+        icon: this.DAGPlusPlusFactory.getIcon(stage.plugin.name),
+        id: stage.id || `${stage.name.replace(/[ \/]/g, '-')}${Math.floor(Math.random() * 100)}`,

timeline.message:
[CDAP-17246] Fixes js error while importing from hub or adding pipeline from wrangler

- Fixes plugins with spaces in labels to show preview data
- Fixes selecting nodes/connections using keyboard to copy/paste
- Fixes e2e tests failing in 6.2.2
- Fixes nodes copied from 6.1.x version of CDAP to pasteable in 6.2.x

[CDAP-17246] Fixes js error while importing from hub or adding pipeline from wrangler

- Fixes plugins with spaces in labels to show preview data
- Fixes selecting nodes/connections using keyboard to copy/paste
- Fixes e2e tests failing in 6.2.2
- Fixes nodes copied from 6.1.x version of CDAP to pasteable in 6.2.x
